mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language (resume_id, language_name, test_name, score, obtained_date, cert_code) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{languageName}, #{testName}, #{score}, #{obtainedDate}, #{certCode});
mapper.update: UPDATE language SET language_name = #{languageName}, test_name = #{testName}, score = #{score}, obtained_date = #{obtainedDate}, cert_code = #{certCode} WHERE language_id = #{languageId};
